name: Leap of Faith (itch) (sakohju)
description:
Project for 2023 Global Game Jam

Zip file download  includes builds for windows and mac

Use the keys to play as a rabbit and navigate the dark forest. Use the cursor to control the fairy and draw root bridges from the yellow nodes to help the rabbit get through the forest.

Click on mushroom nodes to activate/deactivate a bouncy mushroom.
